report.name: x_ligneppcm

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT rpad(LB.pid, 4, ' ') pid, rpad(nvl(LB.pnom,' '),30,' ') pnom, rpad(nvl(LB.typproj,' '),1,' ') typproj, lpad(nvl(to_char(LB.codsg),' '),7,'0') codsg, lpad(nvl(to_char(LB.codcamo),' '),6,'0') codcamo, rpad(nvl(LB.arctype,' '), 3,' ') arctype, lpad(nvl(to_char(LB.pcpi),'0' ), 5,'0') pcpi, rpad(nvl(LB.metier,' '),3,' ') metier, rpad(nvl(LB.pnmouvra,' '),15,' ') pnmouvra, rpad(nvl(LB.icpi,' '),5,' ') icpi, rpad(nvl(PI.ilibel,' '),50,' ') ilibel, rpad(nvl(LB.airt,' '),5,' ') airt, rpad(nvl(AP.alibel,' '),50,' ') alibel, rpad(nvl(DP.dplib,' '),50,' ') dplib, rpad(nvl(LB.astatut,' '),1,' ') astatut, rpad(nvl(to_char(LB.adatestatut,'mmyyyy'),' '),6,' ') adatestatut, lpad(nvl(to_char(round(sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI+sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000, 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),'0'),10,' ') factintd, rpad(nvl(to_char(round(sfb.CONSOSG_FI+sfb.CONSOSSII_FI-sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI-sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000, 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),'0'),10,' ') factint, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(round(sfb.CONSOFTSG_IM + sfb.CONSOFTSSII_IM)/1000 ,0.0), 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') stock_immo , rpad(nvl(LB.topfer,' '),1,' ') topfer, rpad(nvl(LB.clicode,' '),5,' ') codmo, rpad(nvl(LB.toptri,' '),3,' ') tarcproc, rpad(nvl(LB.pzone,' '),20,' ') pzone, lpad(nvl(to_char(LB.dpcode),'0'),5,'0') dpcode, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG_1.bpmontme,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_prop_m1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG_1.bnmont,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_notN_m1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG_1.anmont,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_arb_notN_m1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG.bpmontme,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_propN1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG.reserve,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_propN3, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG.bnmont,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_notN1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG.anmont,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_arb_notN1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG1.bpmontme,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_propN_p11, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG1.bnmont,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_notN_p1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG2.bpmontme,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_propN_p2, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG2.bnmont,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_notN_p2, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG1.bpmontmo,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_propNmo_p1, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG.bpmontmo,'FM99999999990D99'),'0'),8,' ') bud_propNmo, lpad(nvl(to_char(CONSO_2.xcusag, 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),to_char(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') xcusaghi, lpad(nvl(to_char(CONSO_1.cusag, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),to_char(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') xcusagm1, lpad(nvl(to_char(CONSO.cusag, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),to_char(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') xcusag0, lpad(nvl(to_char( round((SAM.consojh_sg +SAM.consojh_ssii ),2) , 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),to_char(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') xcusmois, lpad(nvl(to_char(CONSO.xcusag, 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),to_char(0, 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') xcusag, lpad(nvl(to_char(BUDG.reestime,'FM99999999990D00'),'0'),9,' ') preesancou, rpad(nvl(LB.codpspe,' '),1,' ') codpspe, rpad(PI.icpir,5,' ') icpir, rpad(PIG.ilibel,50,' ') gilibel, rpad(AP.acdareg,5,' ') acdareg, rpad(nvl(APG.alibel,' '),50,' ') galibel, rpad(nvl(LB.clicode_oper,' '),5,' ') codmo_oper, lpad(nvl(to_char(round((sfb.M_CONSOSG_FI + sfb.M_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000) , 'FM99999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),'0,0'),15,' ') CoûtMM, rpad(nvl(LB.sous_type, ' ' ), 3, ' ') sous_typo, rpad(nvl(to_char(PI.dp_copi),' ' ), 6,' ') dpcopicode, rpad(nvl(to_char(DPCOPI.libelle),' ' ), 50,' ') dpcopilib, rpad(DECODE ( (SELECT 'O' FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM isac_sous_tache ist WHERE ist.pid=lb.pid)),'O','oui','non'),3, ' ') Structure_SR, rpad( replace(replace( replace( nvl(to_char(LB.POBJET),' ' ) , CHR(10) , ' ' ), ' ',' '), ';', ',') , 300,' ') pobjet, --Ajout dans le cadre de la PPM 62334 paragraphe 6.9 par FAD decode(:P_param6,'.CSV', DECODE ( DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , NULL , ( DECODE ( PI.PROJAXEMETIER , NULL , ' ' , PI.PROJAXEMETIER ) ) , DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER ) , rpad ( DECODE ( DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , NULL , ( DECODE ( PI.PROJAXEMETIER , NULL , ' ' , PI.PROJAXEMETIER ) ) , DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER ) , 12 , ' ' ) ) Ref_demande, decode(:P_param6,'.CSV', DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , rpad ( NVL ( DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , ' ' ) , 12 , ' ' ) ) DpCopiAxeMetier, decode(:P_param6,'.CSV', PI.PROJAXEMETIER , rpad ( NVL ( PI.PROJAXEMETIER , ' ' ) , 12 , ' ' ) ) ProjAxeMetier, --Fin DECODE(:P_param6,'.TXT',CHR(13),NULL) retour FROM CONSOMME CONSO, CONSOMME CONSO_1, CONSOMME CONSO_2, BUDGET BUDG, --table des budgets pour l'année en cours BUDGET BUDG_1, --table des budgets pour l'année en cours-1 BUDGET BUDG1, --table des budgets pour l'année en cours+1 BUDGET BUDG2, --table des budgets pour l'année en cours+2 BUDGET BUDG3, --table des budgets pour l'année en cours+3 LIGNE_BIP LB, DATDEBEX, APPLICATION AP, PROJ_INFO PI, PROJ_INFO PIG, DOSSIER_PROJET DP, APPLICATION APG, SYNTHESE_ACTIVITE_MOIS SAM, SYNTHESE_FIN_BIP SFB, DOSSIER_PROJET_COPI DPCOPI WHERE -- jointures PI.dp_copi = DPCOPI.dp_copi(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO.pid(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO_1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO_2.pid(+) AND LB.pid = SFB.pid(+) AND LB.pid = SAM.pid (+) AND LB.pid = BUDG.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG_1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG2.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG3.pid(+) AND BUDG.annee(+) = :P_ANNEE AND BUDG_1.annee(+) = :P_ANNEE-1 AND BUDG1.annee(+) = :P_ANNEE+1 AND BUDG2.annee(+) = :P_ANNEE+2 AND BUDG3.annee(+) = :P_ANNEE+3 AND CONSO.annee (+) = :P_ANNEE AND CONSO_1.annee (+) = :P_ANNEE-1 AND CONSO_2.annee (+) = :P_ANNEE-2 AND SAM.cdeb(+) = :P_MOISMENS AND SFB.annee(+) = :P_ANNEE AND LB.codsg > 1 AND LB.icpi = PI.icpi AND LB.airt = AP.airt AND LB.dpcode = DP.dpcode AND PI.icpir = PIG.icpi AND AP.acdareg = APG.airt &P_HAB &P_WHERE ORDER BY LB.pid ;

dataDescriptor.expression: lpad ( nvl ( to_char ( round ( sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI + sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI ) / 1000 , 'FM99999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0' ) , 10 , ' ' )
rpad ( nvl ( to_char ( round ( sfb.CONSOSG_FI + sfb.CONSOSSII_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI ) / 1000 , 'FM99999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0' ) , 10 , ' ' )
lpad ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( NVL ( round ( sfb.CONSOFTSG_IM + sfb.CONSOFTSSII_IM ) / 1000 , 0.0 ) , 'FM99999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0,0' ) , 12 , ' ' )

lpad ( nvl ( to_char ( round ( ( SAM.consojh_sg + SAM.consojh_ssii ) , 2 ) , 'FM99999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , to_char ( 0 , 'FM999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) ) , 8 , ' ' )
lpad ( nvl ( to_char ( round ( ( sfb.M_CONSOSG_FI + sfb.M_CONSOSSII_FI ) / 1000 ) , 'FM99999999990D00' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0,0' ) , 15 , ' ' )
rpad( DECODE((SELECT 'O' FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM isac_sous_tache back WHERE back.pid=bip.pid)),'O','Oui','Non') , 3 , ' ' )
rpad ( replace (replace ( replace ( nvl ( to_char ( LB.POBJET ), ' ' ) , CHR(10) , ' ' ) , ' ' , ' ' ) , ';', ',' ) , 300 , ' ' )

decode( : P_param6 , '.CSV' , DECODE ( DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , NULL , ( DECODE ( PI.PROJAXEMETIER , NULL , ' ' , PI.PROJAXEMETIER ) ) , DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER ) , rpad ( DECODE ( DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , NULL , ( DECODE ( PI.PROJAXEMETIER , NULL , ' ' , PI.PROJAXEMETIER ) ) , DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER ) , 12 , ' ' ) )
decode( : P_param6 , '.CSV' , DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , rpad ( NVL ( DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER , ' ' ) , 12 , ' ' ) )
decode( : P_param6 , '.CSV' , PI.PROJAXEMETIER , rpad ( NVL ( PI.PROJAXEMETIER , ' ' ) , 12 , ' ' ) )

dataItem.name: retour
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param6 Doc Chr 13 Nul

function.name: afterpform
